title: Dreaming Dangerously
description: What if you could HEAR thoughts?Thanks to her ability to mind-drop, Cassie can hear the thoughts of everyone around her. But sometimes her telepathy is more of a curse than a psychic gift, especially when it comes to Will Rossi.Reason #1: He pushes his thoughts at her, whether she wants to hear them or not.Reason #2: His sexy, vindictive ex-girlfriend.Reason #3: His dimples are absolutely, 100% distracting.To her surprise, Cassie feels drawn to Will's electromagnetic vibes. Yet, as she falls for him, she discovers their relationship has some serious side effects. She begins to have dreams about the future - dreams that come true in horrifying ways.Cassie needs to learn to trust Will, or she won't be able to prevent the tragedy she sees coming.Dreaming Dangerously , is the first book in the Children of the Psi series.
author: Kathleen Harsch
